tc.compiler

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • tc.compiler.Message

  • public final class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Group of static fields and methods that the system uses to generate standardized error messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void bug(Location loc, java.lang.String message)
      Emit a message for an internal compiler error.
      static void bug(java.lang.String message)
      Emit a message for an internal compiler error without a Location.
      static void enableLogging()
      Turn on logging of compiler developer messages.
      static void error(Location loc, java.lang.String message)
      Emit message for a semantic error.
      static void fatal(java.lang.String message)
      Emit a message for a fatal user error, such as bad source file name.
      static int getErrorCount()
      Return count of number of semantic errors detected.
      static void log(java.lang.String message)
      Log (emit) compiler developer message (if enabled)
      static void syntaxError(Location loc)
      Emit message for a syntax error and then exit.
      static void usage()
      Emit the "usage" message for running the system.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • syntaxError

        public static void syntaxError(Location loc)
        Emit message for a syntax error and then exit. Must be passed the location because this class only tracks Location during AST evaluation.
        Parameters:
        loc - location (filename and line) of error

      • error

        public static void error(Location loc,
                         java.lang.String message)
        Emit message for a semantic error. Must be passed the location because this class only tracks Location during AST evaluation.
        Parameters:
        loc - location (filename and line) of error
        message - message string to be printed

      • fatal

        public static void fatal(java.lang.String message)
        Emit a message for a fatal user error, such as bad source file name.
        Parameters:
        message - message string to be printed

      • getErrorCount

        public static int getErrorCount()
        Return count of number of semantic errors detected.
        Returns:
        the number of semantic errors detected

      • enableLogging

        public static void enableLogging()
        Turn on logging of compiler developer messages.

      • log

        public static void log(java.lang.String message)
        Log (emit) compiler developer message (if enabled)
        Parameters:
        message - message string to be printed

      • bug

        public static void bug(Location loc,
                       java.lang.String message)
        Emit a message for an internal compiler error.
        Parameters:
        loc - location (filename and line) of error
        message - message string to be printed

      • bug

        public static void bug(java.lang.String message)
        Emit a message for an internal compiler error without a Location.
        Parameters:
        message - message string to be printed

      • usage

        public static void usage()
        Emit the "usage" message for running the system.
